titleStmt.title: A brief dialogve between Zelotopit one of the daughters of a zealous Round-head, and Superstition a holy fryer newly come out of France shewing the zeal of good motions of the one and the idolatry of the other : as also the passages of their holy ones when that they be in their conventicles each one condoling with his holy sister / composed by Owen Dogerell.
titleStmt.author: Dogerell, Owen.

notesStmt.note: Year of publication from Thomason Coll.
Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
